page_content:
# Planning Division

__

#### Department of Planning and Development Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Our offices are open 8:00 a.m. to 4:00 p.m., Monday through Friday. 

__

703-324-1380 TTY 711

__

Email Us

__

12055 Government Center Parkway, Suite 730  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

Kelly Atkinson  
Director

# Comprehensive Plan - Help

## Using the Comprehensive Plan on the Web

  * The Comprehensive Plan is available in portable document format (PDF). The Web version of the Comprehensive Plan consists of large PDF files. Please allow additional time for files to load at slower connection speeds.
  * Use the headers at the top of each page to identify a section and its location in The Plan.
  * The "Amended Through [date]" in each section header of The Plan, identifies when that section was last updated. An asterisk (*) denotes current Comprehensive Plan.
  * Sections of the Comprehensive Plan are updated periodically to incorporate Plan amendments adopted by the Board of Supervisors.
  * The Current & Historic Comprehensive Plan Documents - 2017 Edition webpage contains the current Comprehensive Plan. You can also view the plan by plan area, planning district or special planning area.

metadata.title: Comprehensive Plan - Help | Planning Development
metadata.description: Fairfax County, Virginia - The Comprehensive Plan is required by state law to be used as a guide in decision-making about the built and natural environment by the county's Board of Supervisors and other agencies, such as the Planning Commission.
metadata.keywords: Comprehensive Plan, help, Using the Comprehensive Plan on the Web
